div.p: Attached is an introductory letter to our new Remote Learning Plan that is set to begin on Monday, May 4th. On our website you will find the full plan which is also being mailed as a hard copy and being sent electronically via Peachjar. Be on the lookout for additional info. view image

Attention: Students DRIVER EDUCATION (SUMMER SCHOOL) At this point, Driver Education is scheduled to take place at the South Lewis MS/HS Campus from July 1, 2020, to August 12, 2020. If you are interested, you must register with Mrs. Bronson by phone 315-348-2530, via email tbronson@southlewis.org, or through Family ID (link will available April 22 through May 15). YOU MUST BE A PERMITTED DRIVER IN ORDER TO PARTICIPATE. view image

Attention all students! Expect delivery of the second round of educational materials tomorrow morning.
